name: Lupe

topics.response_text: You need water? I got water, clean and fresh, straight from Lake Mead.

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.
Where do you get your water?
topics.response_text: The NCR fixed up the pipe network pretty good, and water merchants like me are allowed to have some of it to sell.

topics.topic_text: Are there many water merchants around here?
topics.response_text: There's a few independent ones like me, but it's mostly the big trading outfits that deal in water, like the Crimson Caravan Company.

topics.topic_text: Anything I should know about New Vegas?
topics.response_text: They won't just let anybody into the Strip, but you should be able to have a good time in Freeside itself. Just, uh, keep a close eye on your caps.
They're a bunch of crazies hopped up on all kind of drugs. Apparently, they're using one of the old vaults as a hideout.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the NCR?
topics.response_text: Their main base is right over there by the old airport - it's called Camp McCarran now. Some people like to paint 'em all as a bunch of bullies.

topics.topic_text: I have some general questions for you.
That's all I want to know right now.

topics.response_text: The Crimson Caravan Company's the big dog around here. Keep following the road north and you'll eventually come across their camp.

topics.topic_text: Know where I can find a doctor?
topics.response_text: I'm pretty sure they've got a doc over at Camp McCarran, but I don't know if he'll treat just anybody.

topics.topic_text: Do you get a lot of customers?
topics.response_text: The caravans or NCR patrols usually don't stop, but we usually get people like yourself wandering on by a few times a week.

description:
Lupe is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

Lupe is the co-owner of the Grub n' Gulp, a rest stop along the I-15 in the Mojave Wasteland. As a water vendor, she sells both purified and dirty water, often making the darkly humorous comment that 'a little fallout never killed anyone.'

Lupe's Personality: Pragmatic and darkly humorous, Lupe has adapted to the harsh realities of the wasteland. She's business-minded but maintains a casual, somewhat cynical attitude toward life in the post-apocalyptic world.

Lupe's Backstory: Lupe grew up in the wasteland, learning to survive from a young age. She eventually met Fitz, and together they established the Grub n' Gulp as a way to provide essential supplies to travelers along the I-15. While not officially aligned with any major faction, Lupe generally supports the New California Republic's presence in the Mojave, seeing them as a stabilizing force in the region.
